sqlMap.select: SELECT gp.GRP_ID, gp.GRP_CODE, gp.GRP_NAME, gp.GRP_PID, gp.GRP_DESC, gp.GRP_STATE, gp.GRP_SORT, role.ROLE_CODE, role.ROLE_NAME, role.ROLE_PID, role.ROLE_DESC, role.ROLE_STATE, role.ROLE_SORT, role.ROLE_ID FROM security_group gp Inner Join security_role_group_rel rel ON gp.GRP_ID = rel.GRP_ID INNER join security_role role ON rel.ROLE_ID = role.ROLE_ID where 1=1 and role.ROLE_ID = #roleId# order by gp.GRP_CODE,gp.GRP_NAME

SELECT gp.GRP_ID, gp.GRP_CODE, gp.GRP_NAME, gp.GRP_PID, gp.GRP_DESC, gp.GRP_STATE, gp.GRP_SORT, role.ROLE_CODE, role.ROLE_NAME, role.ROLE_PID, role.ROLE_DESC, role.ROLE_STATE, role.ROLE_SORT, role.ROLE_ID FROM security_group gp Inner Join security_role_group_rel rel ON gp.GRP_ID = rel.GRP_ID INNER join security_role role ON rel.ROLE_ID = role.ROLE_ID where 1=1 and role.ROLE_ID = #roleId# and GP.GRP_ID=#GRP_ID# and ROLE.ROLE_ID=#ROLE_ID#
